name: Augustana in Bunny Battle
description:
This is a simple game I created using GB Studio, available at www.gbstudio.dev  It's short and simple.  It was practice to get accustomed to the software.  It's a simple story based on my daughter.  Please let me know your thoughts!

**UPDATE** 7-16-19: The previous version had issues with the player getting stuck in doorways that hadn't been unlocked and the boss battle locking up under certain circumstances.  I believe both of these problems are fixed now.

If you are playing on a keyboard:
Start = "Enter"
Movement = Arrow keys
Interactions = "Z"
